DOC.detailed_description: 60 patient schedule undergo coronary revascularization recruit trial . Exclusion criterion include Emergency operation , age old 80 year , learn difficulty , previous cerebrovascular disease , visual hearing impairment , history pneumothorax , Claustrophobia , middle ear disease , EF < 35 % . Patients randomize either control group hyperbaric oxygen group . The laboratory analysis marker include S100B , NSE troponin I . The assessment cognitive dysfunction perform 5 day surgery 7 day surgery haemodynamic measurement , length stay ICU , length stay hospital post-operation record .
